terms: **ANY OTHER CLAIM OF ANY TYPE WHATSOEVER, WHETHER SUCH CLAIM IS KNOWN OR UNKNOWN TO EXECUTIVE AND/OR HIS REPRESENTATIVES AND ATTORNEYS**
**CANCELLATION OF 2008 SEVERANCE AND CHANGE IN CONTROL AGREEMENT**
**Executive has seven (7) days after signing this Release to revoke this Release, and this Release will not be effective until said seven (7) day revocation period has expired.**
**Executive has the right to consult with an attorney before signing this Release;**
**Executive has twenty-one (21) days to consider this Release; and**
**PLEASE READ CAREFULLY. THIS GENERAL RELEASE AND WAIVER INCLUDES A RELEASE OF ALL KNOWN AND UNKNOWN CLAIMS.**
